remarks: Subtraction/product property of a linear Hilbert space operator. (Contributed by NM, 2-Jul-2005.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
lnopl.1 $e |- T e. LinOp $.
lnopsubmuli $p |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. ~H /\ C e. ~H ) -> ( T ` ( B -h ( A .h C ) ) ) = ( ( T ` B ) -h ( A .h ( T ` C ) ) ) ) $.
